column4: Does anyone here use openbox or fluxbox?, I can't use anything when I install any of them
off course, use the right click
how come you chose to use openbox?
why did you decide to go openbox?
so you want gnome to use openbox?
to set up gnome to use openbox instead of metacity...you need to edit the configuration manager...
no, you still want to use gnome, as I understand, you just want a different wm. Anyone recommend him to use openbox over enlightenment?
you are using the default gnome, that uses metacity as the wm.
you can specify, through the config manager, in APps>System Tools in gnome, to use something else.
on the forums, there is stuff about enlightenment which is a common replacement for metacity.
they are minimal, so you can add stuff to them...
those things are edited through config files.
I can show you how to ecit the config file for openbox, and there is a #fluxbox.
